bibdata.title: Recommended Practices for Cable Installation at Generating Stations (Revision of IEEE 1185-1994)
Recommended Practices for Cable Installation at Generating Stations (Revision of IEEE 1185-1994)
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1185/D7, Feb 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice provides guidance for wire and cable installation practices in generating stations and related power production facilities. This document may also be of benefit for the proper installation of wire and cable in industrial, commercial, governmental, and public facilities when similar wire or cables types and raceways are used.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
